    public class RepastViewControlsSelectListener
extends gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.ViewControlsSelectListener
implements gov.nasa.worldwind.Disposable
    This implementation of RepastViewControlsSelectListener fixes bugs relating to disposal and WW shutdown to make the Timer is released.
    Author:
    Eric Tatara
